title: Anne Hutchinson on teaching about God - comparison

content.prompt: The ideas expressed in the excerpts have the most in common with which of the following?

choices.label: The Civil Rights movement of the 1960s, when African American women asserted their right to vote in federal elections
The flapper culture of the 1920s, when women challenged gender roles through dress
The womenâ€™s liberation movement of the 1970s, when women sought to achieve gender equality in the workplace
The antislavery movement of the 1840s, when women asserted their right to speak on behalf of the cause

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
